DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter observational study evaluate efficacy safety Xeloda ( capecitabine ) combination docetaxel first-line therapy participant HER2-negative metastatic breast cancer . Participants follow approximately 6 month treatment .
DOC.brief_title: XEBRA Study : An Observational Study Xeloda ( Capecitabine ) Combination With Docetaxel First Line Participants With HER2-Negative Metastatic Breast Cancer
